title: Games I've been playing
content:
I've lately been playing Fallout: New Vegas. Unfortunately, it's not aged well, and I've had a ton of crashes.


I also have been playing Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead and FreeCiv, those are cool!

title: Noot noot!
content: The pengin Pingu is notable for his vocalizations: Noot noot!

title: Completely new post!!
content: I wonder if Phaser can be used in this context. Could make some seriously cool animations for games that way!
